item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Dolby atmos in m4a ?
item.description:
I have a question...
when I listen to dolby atmos songs on Apple Music or something, I can directly tell that it's mixed in dolby atmos. However, when i rip a song through tidal-dl and get a multichannel file and play that, all the 3D-features get lost. It's like i'm listening to the usual stereo mix. The only benefit from that is that I can extract the stems, but i cannot hear the 3D sound. Does anyone know what I mean and how to fix that?
item.author: nevidbowie
